      • setCheckType

        public void setCheckType(AmpPMCheckBoxTree.CheckType checkType)
        Sets the type of checkboxs on tree items. After the checkbox type is changed, the whole tree is rebuild and re-rendered.
        Parameters:
        checkType - type of checkboxs
